title: A Celtics' Suspension
description:
Pablo Torre and Tony Kornheiser discuss what new questions arise after the Celtics suspend Ime Udoka for the 22-23 season, their biggest takeaways from last nights Browns’ win over the Steelers and if Aaron Rodgers should be in the conversation for GOAT. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Tony Kornheiser, Michael Wilbon
itunes:subtitle: PTI: The Celtics suspend Ime Udoka for the 22-23 season and is Aaron Rodgers the GOAT?
